text: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford is a 2007 Western movie. It was based on Ron Hansen's 1983 novel of the same name. The movie is directed by Andrew Dominik, with Brad Pitt portraying Jesse James and Casey Affleck as Robert Ford. Filming took place in near Calgary, Edmonton and Winnipeg. ==Actors== * Brad Pitt as Jesse James * Casey Affleck as Robert Ford * Sam Rockwell as Charley Ford * Paul Schneider as Dick Liddel * Jeremy Renner as Wood Hite * Sam Shepard as Frank James * Garret Dillahunt as Edward Miller * Alison Elliott as Martha Bolton * Mary-Louise Parker as Zee James * James Carville as Governor Thomas T. Crittenden * Zooey Deschanel as Dorothy Evans * Hugh Ross as Narrator ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site and trailer * Official website for the Family of Jesse James with the James Family's Own Movie Review * * Category:2007 movies Category:2000s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Canadian movies Category:British movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Andrew Dominik Category:Movies about assassinations
title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
